attributes.title: What a shame 😓
attributes.review: I went to download this app bc we love and support our conservative king !!! But it just was terrible , took forever and I can’t believe how ugly the pictures and graphics are YUCK like why is there a Orange glob on my screen. Anyways Barbz for Bernie ❤️❤️❤️❤️

attributes.title: Giving me very much not it .... 0/10✨🧚🏾❤️
attributes.review: Yeeeaaaaahh so I couldn’t even go to Belle Noches on the app... it was giving me very much ghetto. I really wish I could rate this no stars if we are being very honest. Just wanted to remind everyone that ALL APPS MATTER ❤️🙈✨.

attributes.title: Ruined my life
attributes.review: This app is the bottom of all apps. It hacked all of my information and deleted everything important to me. I had a better time learning organic chemistry than downloading this app.

attributes.title: Wish zero stars was a thing.
attributes.review: This app took 18 WEEKS to download, honestly was expecting better. As soon as I opened the app it wouldn’t let me do anything! It kept lagging and kicking me out. Also he’s just a horrible president. We need Obama back. #NOJUSTICENOPEACE #BLACKLIVESMATTER

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Took forever to download extremely slow and wouldn’t change from news to social

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: first, it took over a YEAR to download. DISGUSTING. then, when i opened the app i had to sell my soul to some orange wack racist, xenophobic, sexist, you NAME it-ist!!! genuinely tho -billion/5 stars for the biggest hypocrite and most evil man in america. dude also has the worst app smh. i heard the biden app kinda slaps tho

attributes.title: “Ya like jazz?”
attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a  bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee  of course, flies anyways. Because bees don't care what humans think is impossible

attributes.title: Too many bugs!!
attributes.review: Ever since I downloaded this app my phone has been glitching out. It wasn’t until I deleted it that this stopped. I suspect it is stealing my information???

attributes.title: This app killed my dog 😡
attributes.review: When I first opened the app, it played a sound that punted my dog across the street. Now I have to hold a funeral for my dog but it won’t be anything like the funeral she truly deserves. Would not recommend downloading!!

attributes.title: Don’t bother downloading.
attributes.review: I don’t understand how someone with so much money can hire such a bad team to develop this app. Really glitchy and slow. Made my phone go crazy. Don’t download, no good comes from this app.
